医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
如果学生有社会关怀历史，他们更有可能被排除在外伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究发现，如果英格兰公立中学的学生有接受过社会关怀或特殊教育需求服务的历史，他们更有可能被排除在外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Pupils-in-schools-are-much-more-likely-to-be-excluded-if-they-have-a-history-of-social-护理.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Pupils-in-schools-are-much-more-likely-to-be-excluded-if-they-have-a-history-of-social- care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52bc97ff-5b9b-47c4-a551-a19e9cb852c9 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:52:34 -0400 Pupils in schools are much more likely to be excluded if they have a history of social care
普遍基因检测可以改善罕见和致命癌症的风险分层和治疗食管腺癌 (EAC) 是一种高度致命的癌症，五年生存率低于 20%。尽管大约 7% 的中年成年人存在一种称为 Barrett 食管 (BE) 的 EAC 前兆病变，但只有不到 1% 的 BE 患者会进展为 EAC，因此很难确定哪些人有发生 EAC 的风险这种致命的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Universal-genic-testing-may-improve-risk-stratification-and-treatment-for-rare-and-lethal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Universal-genic-testing-may-improve-risk-stratification-and-treatment-for-rare-and-lethal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a67c6a7-7c89-4e2a-8b1c-bf1ef441a423 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:39:50 -0400 Universal genetic testing may improve risk stratification and treatment for rare and lethal cancer
研究显示，跨性别儿童需要性别肯定护理一项新的研究显示，由于 2021 年以来 20 个州通过的法律和其他行动，许多需要性别肯定护理的跨性别儿童的家庭将需要比以前走得更远。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Gender-affirming-care-required-for-transgender-children-shows-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Gender-affirming-care-required-for-transgender-children-shows-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=846af4ba-5e3c-4a70-b4be-f6fba40ff50a Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:27:47 -0400 Gender-affirming care required for transgender children, shows study
筛查无法解决黑色素瘤存活率的种族差异：研究根据 UPMC 和匹兹堡大学研究人员的一项新的 JAMA 皮肤病学研究，增加对有色皮肤个体的皮肤癌筛查不足以解决黑色素瘤存活率的种族差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Screening-wont-address-racial-disparities-in-melanoma-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Screening-wont-address-racial-disparities-in-melanoma-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da082401-3050-4024-a724-9f8aafa47fa9 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:17:00 -0400 Screening will not address racial disparities in melanoma survival rates: Study
研究人员发现一种蛋白质在提醒身体注意细菌感染方面发挥着关键作用由马萨诸塞州总医院 (MGH) 的研究人员领导的研究小组发现了一种蛋白质，它在提醒身体注意细菌感染并启动有效的免疫反应以抵抗入侵方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Researchers-discover-a- Protein-that-plays-ritic-roles-in-alerting-the-body-to-a-bacterial-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Researchers-discover-a- Protein-that-plays-ritic-roles-in-alerting-the-body-to-a-bacterial-infection.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82d86479-da17-4cb4-a865-273a19d5e1b6 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:02:12 -0400 Researchers discover a protein that plays critical roles in alerting the body to a bacterial infection
芯片实验室技术提供了评估储存红细胞的新方法第一作者是医学和外科工程中心 (CEMS) 研究员 Ziya Isiksacan 博士，马萨诸塞州总医院 CEMS 研究员、哈佛医学院外科副教授 Osman Berk Usta 博士School 是《美国国家科学院院刊》上发表的一项新研究的资深作者，《通过精密输血医学芯片实验室技术评估储存的红细胞》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Lab-on-a-chip-technologies-offer-new-ways-to-assess-stored-red-blood-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Lab-on-a-chip-technologies-offer-new-ways-to-assess-stored-red-blood-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66f038df-5efe-4bb1-95c9-a5f645c88112 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 23:13:00 -0400 Lab-on-a-chip technologies offer new ways to assess stored red blood cells
患有阿尔茨海默病风险基因的人可能会失去较早察觉气味的能力一项发表的研究表明，携带与阿尔茨海默病风险最强相关的基因变异的人可能比不携带该基因变异的人更早失去检测气味的能力，这可能是未来记忆和思维问题的早期迹象。 2023 年 7 月 26 日，美国神经病学学会医学杂志 Neurology® 在线期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/People-with-Alzheimers-risk-gene-may-lose-ability-to-detect-odors-earlier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/People-with-Alzheimers-risk-gene-may-lose-ability-to-detect-odors-earlier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6a2fab9-e1f2-44d5-b195-da778f053fa7 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 23:08:00 -0400 People with Alzheimer's risk gene may lose ability to detect odors earlier
专家权衡新阿尔茨海默病疗法的益处和风险针对早期阿尔茨海默病的新疗法，即消除大脑中β淀粉样蛋白斑块的单克隆抗体，为生活受到该疾病影响的人们带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Experts-weigh-benefits-and-risks-of-new-Alzheimers-disease-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Experts-weigh-benefits-and-risks-of-new-Alzheimers-disease-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87e76382-ecb6-4e0e-8ebc-2724d0da8655 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 23:05:00 -0400 Experts weigh benefits and risks of new Alzheimer's disease therapies
英国皇家学院从药品和医疗器械公司获得数百万美元的营销费用《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项调查发现，自 2015 年以来，英国皇家学院已从药品和医疗器械公司收到超过 900 万英镑的营销付款，但并不总是公开披露这些付款。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Royal-colleges-in-the-UK-receive-millions-in-marketing- payments-from-drug-and-medical-device-companies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Royal-colleges-in-the-UK-receive-millions-in-marketing- payments-from-drug-and-medical-device-companies.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad573c0f-264b-4c33-950c-8edfa083af42 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 22:54:00 -0400 Royal colleges in the UK receive millions in marketing payments from drug and medical device companies
昆达里尼瑜伽可能对患有阿尔茨海默病风险因素的老年女性有益加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的一项研究表明，昆达里尼瑜伽是一种专注于呼吸、冥想和心理想象的瑜伽形式，对于患有阿尔茨海默氏症风险因素和担心记忆力下降的老年女性似乎有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Kundalini-yoga-may-be-beneficial-for-older-women-with-Alzheimers-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Kundalini-yoga-may-be-beneficial-for-older-women-with-Alzheimers-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=540ed927-63f9-476e-afa6-1858dce5ace1 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 22:47:00 -0400 Kundalini yoga may be beneficial for older women with Alzheimer's risk factors
